# dictionaryHasDefinition(forTerm:)

**Type Method**

Returns whether a definition is available for the given term.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func dictionaryHasDefinition(forTerm term: String) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **term**: The term to be defined.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a definition for `term` is available; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Creating a reference-library view controller

- **init(term:)**: Initializes a newly created reference-library view controller to display the definition of the given term.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a reference-library view controller from data in an unarchiver.
